item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: webcommunicationsproject2025
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: webcommunicationsproject2025
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://snehretskyi.scweb.ca/wptest.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: webcommunicationsproject2025
item.content:encoded:
Ukrainian Saturday School in Windsor, Ontario 

Welcome to our young, yet already successful Ukrainian Saturday School, Ridna Shkola! We proudly teach children from Windsor and the surrounding areas, providing them with the opportunity to learn the Ukrainian language, traditions, culture, and history of our Homeland. 

Our Mission

Our school aims to create an environment where every child, whether they arrived from Ukraine or were born in Canada, can deepen their understanding of Ukrainian heritage. We believe that through knowledge of the native language and culture, children will be able to better understand themselves and their roots and pass these values on to future generations. 

Learning at our school is not just about language lessons but also about creative activities, participation in competitions, performances at concerts, and various events. We encourage our students to be active, creative, and confident in their abilities. 

Our Staff

The heart of our Ukrainian Saturday School is its dedicated and passionate team. Our school is led by a director, an experienced Ukrainian language teacher, and four devoted volunteers who work tirelessly to provide the best education and unforgettable experiences for our students.

Olha Bambura

Vira Morozenko

Tetiana Pimkina

Gallery

item.title: Achievements
item.dc:creator: webcommunicationsproject2025
item.content:encoded:
Winter Poetry Triumph

This year, three of our students, Karolina Bondarenko, Hlib Yefimov, and Davyd Yefimov, participated in a literary competition, and we are proud to share their poems about winter. Their creative works impressed everyone, and we take great pride in their talent and dedication. This is a wonderful example of how our students grow and express themselves through the art of words. 

Showcasing Tradition on TV

This year, one of our students, Artem Chaban, participated in the TV project Telekoliada with a beautiful Christmas carol. We are proud of his performance and dedication to Ukrainian traditions. This is an important step in his creative development, and we are thrilled that he had the opportunity to represent our culture at such a level.

item.title: Головна сторінка
item.dc:creator: webcommunicationsproject2025
item.content:encoded:
Українська суботня школа у Віндзорі, Онтаріо

Ласкаво просимо до нашої молодої, але вже досить успішної української суботньої школи, що має назву Рідна Школа! Ми з гордістю навчаємо дітей з Віндзора та околиць, даруючи їм можливість вивчати українську мову, традиції, культуру та історію нашої Батьківщини.

Наша Ціль

Наша школа прагне створити середовище, де кожна дитина, незалежно від того, чи приїхала вона з України, чи народилася вже в Канаді, може поглибити своє розуміння української спадщини. Ми віримо, що через знання рідної мови та культури діти зможуть краще зрозуміти себе та свої корені, а також передати ці цінності майбутнім поколінням. 

Навчання в нашій школі — це не лише заняття з мови, а й творчі активності, участь у конкурсах, виступах на концертах і різноманітних заходах. Ми заохочуємо наших учнів бути активними, креативними та впевненими у своїх можливостях. 

Наш Колектив

Серце нашої української суботньої школи — це її відданий і пристрасний колектив. Наша школа має директора, досвідченого вчителя української мови та чотирьох волонтерів, які працюють не шкодуючи сил, аби забезпечити найкраще навчання та незабутні враження для наших учнів. Кожен із членів колективу має глибоке прагнення сприяти любові до української мови, культури та традицій.

Ольга Бамбура

Віра Морозенко

Тетяна Пімкіна

Галерея

item.title: Досягнення
item.dc:creator: webcommunicationsproject2025
item.content:encoded:
Зимовий Конкурс Літератури

Цього року троє наших учнів Кароліна Бондаренко, Гліб Єфімов та Давид Єфімов, брали участь у літературному конкурсі, і ми з гордістю ділимося їхніми віршами про зиму. Їх творчі роботи вразили всіх, і ми пишаємося їхнім талантом та відданістю справі. Це чудовий приклад того, як наші учні розвиваються та проявляють себе через мистецтво слова. 

Показ Традицій на ТБ

Цього року один з наших учнів, Артем Чабан, брав участь у телепроекті Телеколяда з чудовою колядкою. Ми пишаємося його виступом та відданістю українським традиціям. Це важливий крок у його творчому розвитку, і ми раді, що він має можливість представити нашу культуру на такому рівні.

item.title: Зв'язок з Нами
item.dc:creator: webcommunicationsproject2025
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Announcement
item.dc:creator: webcommunicationsproject2025
item.content:encoded: Our students are currently busy preparing for a performance at the concert dedicated to the birthday of Taras Shevchenko, which will take place on March 9th at 14:00. They are putting all their energy and creativity into the preparation to honor the great poet. Here are a few photos from the first rehearsal, showing how the children are already working on their performances. We eagerly look forward to this significant event and are proud of our students' talents!

item.title: Оголошення
item.dc:creator: webcommunicationsproject2025
item.content:encoded: Наразі наші учні активно готуються до виступу на концерті, присвяченому Дню народження Тараса Шевченка, який відбудеться 9 березня о 14:00. Вони вкладають всю свою енергію та творчість у підготовку, щоб віддати шану великому поету. Ось декілька фото з першої репетиції, на яких можна побачити, як діти вже працюють над своїми номерами. Ми з нетерпінням чекаємо на цей важливий захід і пишаємося талантом наших учнів!
